text: Always a good experience with Dr John and the team. Dr John is very patient in explaining everything and I feel comfortable asking all my queries. Receptionists are friendly and helpful too! Delivered my first kid with Dr John and will be delivering my second one with him too :)

Great service! Staff are always polite and professional. DrJohn is patient and explains things clearly. Consultation never feels hurried. Have never waited for more than half an hour to see him. Worth every dollar spent as a private patient.
